ComicInfo.Title: Exodus
ComicInfo.Summary: Exodus: Reality TV show follows Chris, a genetically-engineered clone of Jesus Christ, from about age 3 to about age 15. His mother, Gwen, tries to give him a normal life, and blackmails Slate to let Chris attend public school. Gwen tries to leave and take Chris, Slate fires Gwen and locks her out. On TV Chris says the show is over until his mom comes back, and spray paints messages like 'I'm a hostage' on walls. Gwen tries to commit suidcide by jumping from a building, but is saved by a flying man. When she wakes up the next day the bruises from where he caught her convince her she didn't imagine it.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 04:24:20. [Issue ID 958278]
